snippet.title: Pluralys : Reveal Teaser
snippet.description:
Pluralys is now on Steam, a single-player 2D pixel-art RPG by Ivalys Studios.

Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/3275440/Pluralys/

You play the role of Elie, young and a little too innocent...

The world you live in doesn't seem to pose any particular problems. But it seems you're not alone...Some people from elsewhere seem to need your help! So, motivated by your good intentions, you want to help them. Unfortunately, the people who have contacted you may not be as well-intentioned as they claim...

Is it too late? Have you fallen into a trap? Is it still possible to turn back? What choice do you have?

You can find us : 
Pluralys website : https://www.pluralys.ca/
Social Networks : https://linktr.ee/pluralys

#indiegame #rpg #pluralys #steam #cozygames #videogames #videogame #trailer #gametrailers #pixelart #gaming
